channel.title: Deleting Doors

item.title: Deleting Doors
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

watch n lern:

just go to your config folder, and open doors.cfg, then set all of their “state”(s) as 1. this means they are open.

NVM, thanks but that doesnt DELETE the door but closes/opens it. So I still need to figure that out

Read full topic

item.title: Deleting Doors
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

I’m using delta source atm and I’m trying to delete a door

Ive tried using this

[code] }
public void deletethatwall(int objectX, int objectY) {
ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10);
}
public void Deletewalls() {

	deletethatwall(2892, 3511);
	deletethatwall(2892, 3510);[/code]

But the door keeps staying
And yes, Ive tried both sides of the doors, that still didnt work :mad:

Read full topic
